trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with Picturepark | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with Picturepark | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Picturepark with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Picturepark with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with Picturepark
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with Picturepark

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=524466).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=524466).

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Picturepark.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Picturepark.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Picturepark tenant
trans-unit.target: A Picturepark tenant

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Picturepark will be able to single sign into the application at your Picturepark company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Picturepark will be able to single sign into the application at your Picturepark company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Picturepark
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Picturepark

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Picturepark
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Picturepark

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Picturepark.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Picturepark.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for Picturepark, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for Picturepark, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add application
trans-unit.target: Add application

trans-unit.source: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: Add an application from gallerry
trans-unit.target: Add an application from gallerry

trans-unit.source: In the **search box**, type **Picturepark**.
trans-unit.target: In the **search box**, type **Picturepark**.

trans-unit.source: Application Gallery
trans-unit.target: Application Gallery

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **Picturepark**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **Picturepark**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: Picturepark
trans-unit.target: Picturepark

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Picturepark with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Picturepark with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on for Picturepark requires you to retrieve a thumbprint value from a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on for Picturepark requires you to retrieve a thumbprint value from a certificate.

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see [How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value](http://youtu.be/YKQF266SAxI)..
trans-unit.target: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see [How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value](http://youtu.be/YKQF266SAxI)..

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Picturepark** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Picturepark** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Picturepark** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Picturepark** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Picturepark Sign On URL** textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "*http://company.picturepark.com*", and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Picturepark Sign On URL** textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "*http://company.picturepark.com*", and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure App URL
trans-unit.target: Configure App URL

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at Picturepark** page, to download your certificate, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file locally on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at Picturepark** page, to download your certificate, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file locally on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your Picturepark company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your Picturepark company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the toolbar on the top, click **Administrative tools**, and then click **Management Console**.
trans-unit.target: In the toolbar on the top, click **Administrative tools**, and then click **Management Console**.

trans-unit.source: Management Console
trans-unit.target: Management Console

trans-unit.source: Click **Authentication**, and then click **Identity providers**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Authentication**, and then click **Identity providers**.

trans-unit.source: Authentication
trans-unit.target: Authentication

trans-unit.source: In the **Identity provider configuration** section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the **Identity provider configuration** section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Identity provider configuration
trans-unit.target: Identity provider configuration

trans-unit.source: Click **Add**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add**.

trans-unit.source: Type a name for your configuration.
trans-unit.target: Type a name for your configuration.

trans-unit.source: Select **Set as default**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Set as default**.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Picturepark** dialog page, copy the **SAML SSO URL** value, and then paste it into the **Issuer URI** textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Picturepark** dialog page, copy the **SAML SSO URL** value, and then paste it into the **Issuer URI** textbox.

trans-unit.source: Copy the **Thumbprint** value from the exported certificate, and then paste it into the **Trusted Issuer Thumb Print** textbox.
trans-unit.target: Copy the **Thumbprint** value from the exported certificate, and then paste it into the **Trusted Issuer Thumb Print** textbox.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For more details, see [How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value](http://youtu.be/YKQF266SAxI)
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For more details, see [How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value](http://youtu.be/YKQF266SAxI)

trans-unit.source: Click **JoinDefaultUsersGroup**.
trans-unit.target: Click **JoinDefaultUsersGroup**.

trans-unit.source: To set the **Emailaddress** attribute in the **Claim** textbox, type **http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/emailaddress**.
trans-unit.target: To set the **Emailaddress** attribute in the **Claim** textbox, type **http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/emailaddress**.

trans-unit.source: ![Configuration](./media/active-directory-saas-picturepark-tutorial/IC795065.png "Configuration")
trans-unit.target: ![Configuration](./media/active-directory-saas-picturepark-tutorial/IC795065.png "Configuration")

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Picturepark, they must be provisioned into Picturepark.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Picturepark, they must be provisioned into Picturepark.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Picturepark, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Picturepark, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: To provision a user accounts, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To provision a user accounts, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Log in to your **Picturepark** tenant.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your **Picturepark** tenant.

trans-unit.source: In the toolbar on the top, click **Administrative tools**, and then click **Users**.
trans-unit.target: In the toolbar on the top, click **Administrative tools**, and then click **Users**.

trans-unit.source: Users
trans-unit.target: Users

trans-unit.source: In the **Users overview** tab, click **New**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Users overview** tab, click **New**.

trans-unit.source: User management
trans-unit.target: User management

trans-unit.source: On the **Create User** dialog, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the **Create User** dialog, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Create User
trans-unit.target: Create User

trans-unit.source: Type the : **Email Address**, **Password**, **Confirm Password**, **First Name**, **Last Name**, **Company**, **Country**, **ZIP**, **City** of a valid Azure Active Directory User you want ot provision into the related textboxes.
trans-unit.target: Type the : **Email Address**, **Password**, **Confirm Password**, **First Name**, **Last Name**, **Company**, **Country**, **ZIP**, **City** of a valid Azure Active Directory User you want ot provision into the related textboxes.

trans-unit.source: Select a **Language**.
trans-unit.target: Select a **Language**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]You can use any other Picturepark user account creation tools or APIs provided by Picturepark to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]You can use any other Picturepark user account creation tools or APIs provided by Picturepark to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to Picturepark, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to Picturepark, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **Picturepark **application integration page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Picturepark **application integration page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: Assign Users
trans-unit.target: Assign Users

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
